revision.text: ==Azerbaijani== ===Etymology=== From {{suf|az|yeni|lik}}. ===Noun=== {{az-head-noun|i|k}} # [[newness]], [[novelty]] # [[innovation]] # [[news]] {{gl|new information of interest}} ====Declension==== {{az-decl-noun|i|k}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:az:Obastan}} ---- ==Turkish== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|tr|ota|یڭیلك|tr=yeñilik}}, equivalent to {{suffix|tr|yeni|lik|t1=new|t2=-ness}}. ===Noun=== {{tr-noun|yeniliği|ler}} # [[newness]], [[novelty]] # [[innovation]] ====Declension==== {{tr-infl-noun-c|i|stem=yeniliğ|poss=1}}
